me.adaptive.arp.api

Interface IAccelerationListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IAdaptiveRP, IBaseListener

    public interface IAccelerationListener
extends IBaseListener
    Interface defines the response methods of the acceleration operations
    Since:
    v2.0

    • Nested Class Summary

    • Method Detail

      • onResult

        void onResult(Acceleration acceleration)
        Correct data received.
        Parameters:
        acceleration - Acceleration received

      • onWarning

        void onWarning(Acceleration acceleration,
               IAccelerationListener.Warning warning)
        Data received with warning - ie. Needs calibration.
        Parameters:
        acceleration - Acceleration received
        warning - Warning fired
        Since:
        v2.0

      • onError

        void onError(IAccelerationListener.Error error)
        No data received - error condition, not authorized or hardware not available. This will be reported once for the listener and subsequently, the listener will be deactivated and removed from the internal list of listeners.
        Parameters:
        error - Error fired
        Since:
        v2.0
